author: Disney
description:
In celebration of Percy Jackson's birthday, we're sharing a D23 Gold View of an exclusive panel celebrating 20 years of Percy Jackson and the Olympians. Hosted by D23 Inside Disney's Lisa Cabello, get the inside scoop on the books, Disney+ series, and what's new and next from bestselling author Rick Riordan. 
 
Want to attend epic events like these in person? Join D23 today! D23.com/Join

title: D23 Gold View | Rick Riordan Talks Percy Jackson and The Olympians 20th Anniversary
